original_text: ‘Tell the Israelites this. I am bringing them into the land of Canaan. After they have gone into it, they must obey my rules.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 이르라 너희는 내가 인도하는 땅에 들어가거든

sentences.original_text: I am bringing them into the land of Canaan.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 가나안 땅으로 데려가고 있다.

sentences.original_text: After they have gone into it,
